item.description:
Event Description: This is our once annual clearance sale on all of our NERF Blasters, NERF gear, Super Soakers, Foam Swords, Training Equipment, Fencing equipment, Costuming and more. Everything is 20-70% off. We will also have a huge sale in one of our training rooms where we will be clearing out gently used equipment for bargain prices. You will find everything from sport bags, sparring equipment, training weapons, costuming and much more. If you are a Guard Up member or camper, this is a great opportunity to outfit yourself for our events. If you are not a member, you can still find some excellent deals and holiday gifts here.

 

Important Info: Why wait for Black Friday? Join us for a very limited time period on Sunday, October 16th from 1-4pm. Please do not arrive early or you will have to wait outside – the sale will begin at precisely 1pm. Sorry, we cannot hold any items. This event is open to the public. More information at www.guardup.com or call (781) 270-4800.
item.name: Swords & NERF Clearance Sale!
